segments.text: Welcome to NO Bank . It's Mr Zu , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ah , Jenny ! You remember me , what a good memory you have .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How's Mrs Zu doing these days ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She's fine , thanks . Actually , she's the reason I'm here . It's our Wedding Anniversary in 2 weeks and I want to get her something special . She's been nagging me about our furniture , you see .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I give you some advice on a loan , or ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to cash my undue Large-Amount Deposit Certificate , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you absolutely sure , Mr Zu ? You know , you will lose interest if you do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I know . But it can't be helped . It's been a pretty slow month and I just don't have enough cash to refurnish the whole house .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me run through a couple of other options with you . That way , you can make a more informed decision .
segments.speaker: S1
